title: ‘Survivor,’ Season 41, Episode 8
description:
This week, Tyson and Riley are joined by singer-songwriter Derek Webb to break down the first post-merge episode. They share their thoughts on Ricard’s ‘Survivor’ faux pas and discuss yet another wild tribal council. They close by handing out this week’s superlatives. 

Hosts: Tyson Apostol and Riley McAtee
Guest: Derek Webb
Editor: Mike Wargon
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
